content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles at positions:
  - (-16.5, 18.5)
  - (-16.5, 19.5)
  - (-16.5, 20.5)
  - (-16.5, 21.5)
  - (-19.5, 22.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-18.0, -49.0) and a furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0)

### Coal furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (5.0, -73.0) and a furnace at position (5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)

### PIPE GROUPS
Consists of various pipe groups for fluid transport:
- PipeGroup for steam at position (-15.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup for water at position (-12.5, 21.5)
- Additional pipe groups at positions (-9.5, 21.5), (-10.5, 22.5), and (-6.5, 23.5)

### ELECTRICITY GROUP
Consists of:
- Small electric poles at positions (-15.5, 18.5), (-15.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 20.5), (-15.5, 21.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource before attempting to harvest. 

### Errors when connecting entities
- Make sure the entities you are trying to connect are within the correct range and that there are no obstacles in between. Check the positions of the entities to ensure they align properly.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target tile.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
